Checking Courses in didactr

John Muschelli, Shannon Ellis

2018-07-02

Source: vignettes/checking_courses.Rmd
checking_courses.Rmd
## load libraries
library(didactr)
library(git2r)
course_url = "https://github.com/muschellij2/cds_testclass"
tfile = tempfile()
tfile = path.expand(tfile)
dir.create(tfile, recursive = TRUE)
local_path = file.path(tfile, basename(course_url))
clone(course_url, 
      local_path = local_path, 
      credentials = cred_token())
#> cloning into '/var/folders/1s/wrtqcpxn685_zk570bnx9_rr0000gr/T//RtmpX3QtsS/file344112f988cf/cds_testclass'...
#> Receiving objects:   4% (1/25),    8 kb
#> Receiving objects:  12% (3/25),    8 kb
#> Receiving objects:  24% (6/25),    8 kb
#> Receiving objects:  32% (8/25),    8 kb
#> Receiving objects:  44% (11/25),    8 kb
#> Receiving objects:  52% (13/25),    8 kb
#> Receiving objects:  64% (16/25),    8 kb
#> Receiving objects:  72% (18/25),    8 kb
#> Receiving objects:  84% (21/25),    8 kb
#> Receiving objects:  92% (23/25),    8 kb
#> Receiving objects: 100% (25/25),    9 kb, done.
#> Local:    master /private/var/folders/1s/wrtqcpxn685_zk570bnx9_rr0000gr/T/RtmpX3QtsS/file344112f988cf/cds_testclass
#> Remote:   master @ origin (https://github.com/muschellij2/cds_testclass)
#> Head:     [c78bc66] 2018-06-26: damned newlines
course_dir = local_path
course_title = "Test CDS class"

##TO ADD generate lenpub structure
##TO ADD create_manuscript(".md")


auth_file = "../tests/testthat/googlesheets_token.rds"
if (file.exists(auth_file)) {
  didactr_auth(token_file = auth_file)
} else {
  x = didactr_auth()
}
check_didactr_auth()
#> [1] TRUE
## check course structure
## fill in missing directories
paths <- check_structure(course_dir)
#> Creating missing /private/var/folders/1s/wrtqcpxn685_zk570bnx9_rr0000gr/T/RtmpX3QtsS/file344112f988cf/cds_testclass/manuscript/resources directory
#> Creating missing /private/var/folders/1s/wrtqcpxn685_zk570bnx9_rr0000gr/T/RtmpX3QtsS/file344112f988cf/cds_testclass/manuscript/resources/images directory
#> Creating missing /private/var/folders/1s/wrtqcpxn685_zk570bnx9_rr0000gr/T/RtmpX3QtsS/file344112f988cf/cds_testclass/manuscript/resources/videos directory
#> Creating missing /private/var/folders/1s/wrtqcpxn685_zk570bnx9_rr0000gr/T/RtmpX3QtsS/file344112f988cf/cds_testclass/metrics directory

## get current status of course
course_status <- check_course(course_dir)
#> Warning in rm(list = c("scr_para_length ", "yt_md_link ", "vid_file")):

## download PDFs and PNGs
## put them where they belong
course_status <- create_images(course_status, 
                               extra.opts = "-density 400 -quality 200")

## Create Videos
## tell R what AWS keys to use
aws.signature::use_credentials(profile="polly")
course_status <- create_videos(
  course_status
)
head(course_status$course_summary)

Upload Videos to YouTube

The following section is for uploading videos to YouTube. This uploading is done through tuber See https://github.com/soodoku/tuber#using-tuber for setting up the credentials for YouTube.

## Upload Videos & Update YouTube log
course_status <- vids_to_youtube(course_status, course_title=course_title)

## to take a look at youtube videos
youtube_uploads <- readRDS(file.path(paths$met_path, "youtube_uploads.rds"))
head(youtube_uploads)

Once the videos are uploaded you can upload the following links using:

## Update Youtube Link in Manuscript file
course_status <- update_youtube_link(course_status)

## get current status of course
head(course_status$course_summary)
